import React from 'react'; import Products from '../../data/products'; import Rating from '../Product/rating'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { FaArrowAltCircleLeft } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ProductDetails = ({ match }) => { const product = Products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id); return(
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} {product.description} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock :("}
) } export default ProductDetails
